name: Dwarrows
descr: 关于此游戏Build and grow a new settlement and explore the lands surrounding it in thisPeaceful Action-Adventure & Town-Builder. Search the lush forests of the Dusken Woodlands for resources, and adventure through mysterious new places to find lost artifacts.Meet strange and quirky characters along the way, invite wandering people to join your town, and befriend cute animals who may help you in your travels. Control your team of three uniquely skilled characters to gather resources, build structures, and find treasure.FeaturesExplore:Play as three uniquely skilled characters to quest and puzzle through a peaceful and atmospheric world.Gather:Supply your town with resources gathered from the land surrounding it, from hidden treasures, and other wonders.Build:Discover and unlock new structures to grow and improve your town.Befriend:Find friendship in the local wildlife to help boost your town and character abilities, and invite the wandering Wood-Elves to join and grow your town.
detail:
名称: Dwarrows
类型: 冒险, 独立, 策略
开发者: Lithic Entertainment Inc.
发行商: Lithic Entertainment Inc.
发行日期: 2020 年 2 月 28 日
review: 全部评测: 多半好评 (93) - 此游戏的 93 篇用户评测中有 70% 为好评。
全部评测: 多半好评 (93 篇中的 70%) 发布至今
sysreq:
Windows
最低配置:
需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
操作系统: Windows 10 (Requires 64-bit)
处理器: Intel CPU Core i5-760 / AMD FX-9590
内存: 4 GB RAM
显卡: Nvidia GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270
DirectX 版本: 11
存储空间: 需要 3 GB 可用空间

需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

内存: 8 GB RAM
